text: CLOSE The question on the red carpet for the 75th Golden Globe Awards was not “ who are you wearing? ” but rather “ why are you wearing? ” as most celebrities wore black in solidarity with sex harassment victims worldwide. ( Jan. 8 ) AP During the Golden Globes, TV viewers saw Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri and Big Little Lies win four trophies each and heard Oprah Winfrey's stirring speech. But what happened away from the cameras Sunday night? We sat inside the Beverly Hilton and saw these 10 things that weren't on the telecast. 1.
